programs.title: The Golden Girls Project
contents: Golden Girls Project was created in 2020 by The Joseph Center to provide transitional housing for middle aged to elderly women 50+. While waiting for SSI/Disability benefits, survivor benefits, securing employment, and securing permanent housing, Our Golden Girls can be housed free of charge for up to 6 months. The Apartment is a large two-bedroom space with a maximum of 4 beds. Guests have access to a kitchen, bathroom, shower, television, and internet.
services: Onsite health clinic every other Thursday
programs.goal: Provide transitional housing and support services to empower homeless women 50+ in Mesa County.
